name: Ch17ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Amelia;Oof!|I can't believe I tripped over my own lance again...|Some soldier I'm turning out to be.
speak;Tethys;My, my. That was quite the tumble you took there.|Are you alright, dear?
speak;Amelia;Oh!|T-Tethys! I didn't see you there.
speak;Tethys;I've been watching you for a little while now.|You seem to have some... coordination issues.
speak;Amelia;I-I know...|I've always been clumsy.|No matter how hard I try, I keep stumbling around.
speak;Tethys;Hmm...|You know, I think I might be able to help with that.
speak;Tethys;With dance, of course!|Dancing improves balance, coordination, and awareness of your body's movements.
speak;Amelia;D-Dancing?|But I'm even worse at dancing than I am at marching!
speak;Tethys;Everyone starts somewhere, dear.|Would you allow me to teach you some basic steps?
speak;Amelia;I don't know...|I'll probably just embarrass myself...
speak;Tethys;Nonsense!|There's no one around to see, and I promise I won't laugh.
speak;Amelia;Well...|Alright. I'll give it a try.|But don't say I didn't warn you!
speak;Tethys;Wonderful!|Now, let's start with something simple.|Follow my lead...
speak;Tethys;It's quite alright.|Let's try again, but slower this time.
speak;Amelia;I tripped again!|Maybe this isn't such a good idea after all...
speak;Tethys;Patience, dear Amelia.|Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither is a dancer.
speak;Amelia;I guess you're right...|Let me try once more.
speak;Tethys;There you go!|You're starting to get it!
speak;Amelia;I am?|I... I think I am!
speak;Tethys;Now add a little sway...|Yes, just like that!
speak;Amelia;This is actually... fun!|And I haven't fallen for at least a minute!
speak;Tethys;You're a natural once you find your rhythm.|Look how gracefully you're moving now!
speak;Amelia;I can't believe it!|I'm actually dancing!
speak;Tethys;You've done wonderfully, Amelia.|In fact, I have something for you.
speak;Tethys;For being such a dedicated student.|Wait right here.
speak;Amelia;I wonder what it could be...|I hope I didn't impose too much on her time.
speak;Tethys;Here they are!|A pair of dancing shoes.|They're lightweight and perfect for beginners.
speak;Tethys;They'll help you maintain your balance.|And they might just give you a bit more confidence too.
speak;Amelia;Thank you so much, Tethys!|This means more to me than you know.
speak;Tethys;It's my pleasure, dear.|Now, shall we continue our lesson?|We've only just begun!
speak;Amelia;Yes, please!|I want to learn everything you can teach me!
speak;Tethys;That's the spirit!|Now, let's try a spin...
